sen.j: 近世における枕草子注釈の最高峰として、同じ年に刊印された加藤盤斎（1625－1674）の『清少納言枕草紙抄』を圧倒したばかりでなく、明治まで版を重ねて広く流布した（元禄の頃にはすでに海賊版が横行したという）。
sen.e: As the high point of commentary of Makura no Soshi in the early modern period, it not only overwhelmed "Seishonagon Makura no Soshi Sho" by Bansai KATO (1625 - 1674) issued in the same year, but also widely circulated going through editions until the Meiji era (reportedly, already in the Genroku era (1688 - 1703). pirated editions were rife.).
